name: Ninetales
author: Suwama Chiaki
flavor_text: Its nine tails are said to be imbued with a mystic power. It can live for a thousand years.

attacks.name: Flame Bash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. Search your deck for a number of basic {R} Energy cards up to the number of heads and attach them to any of your Pokémon in any way you like. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Mysterious Flames
attacks.effect: If you have more Energy in play than your opponent, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned and Confused.
